summary: Build an official website for Guru Kirpa Mill Industries (nut & bolt manufacturer).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal industrial logo mark with a nut/bolt motif, monochrome + accent variant (gkmi-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide homepage hero image featuring nuts/bolts with an industrial workshop feel, high contrast, neutral tones (hero-fasteners.dim_1920x800.png)
- Set of simple line icons for homepage highlights (quality, manufacturing, delivery), consistent stroke style (icons-fasteners-set.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive official marketing website for “Guru Kirpa Mill Industries” (manufacturer of nuts & bolts) with clear navigation and SEO-friendly page structure.
Implement core pages/sections: Home, About, Products (nuts/bolts categories with a simple catalog-style layout), Manufacturing/Infrastructure, Quality/Standards, and Contact.
Add a contact/inquiry form that submits inquiries to the Motoko backend for storage, with user feedback (success/error) and basic validation (required fields).

Apply a cohesive visual theme suitable for an industrial fasteners manufacturer: steel/graphite neutrals with a single accent color (not blue/purple), strong typography, and clean section-based layouts; use Tailwind consistently across the site.
Add generated static brand and homepage imagery under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (logo + homepage hero/section visuals).

new_feature_requests.summary: Generate an official company website for Guru Kirpa Mill Industries (manufacturer of nuts & bolts).
Implement Motoko backend inquiry storage with stable persistence and APIs to create an inquiry and list inquiries (for future admin use).
